segments.text: Hi , Bill . It's Marsha Black at MPPD Ltd . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Marsha , I haven't heard from you in a long time . I'm great , and you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not too bad at all . Do you have a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're getting ready to place our Christmas orders and we need to know about how much it's going to run this year.You know , so we can have the funds put aside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really busy right now . I got a lot on my plate.So this isn't an actual bid you want but just a ballpark figure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , a ballpark figure is fine , and slant it a little high if you have to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can give you those figures now over the phone , is that okay ? Or do you need them in writing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's going to be shown to the Board so I need it in writing.Make all the prices subject to confirmation so you can't be held to them . How soon can I have it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this another rush , dear ? Did you forget and wait until the last minute again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I'm afraid so . I really need your help here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , just because it's you . Tomorrow , say around noon .
segments.speaker: S2
